author: kfogel
msg: The second item from Ben's "todo list"; see also revision 2515.
`dest' first, to match the convention in the rest of Subversion.

author: kfogel
msg: Ben and I talked, agreed that I would do some of the "todo list" he
posted last night.  This is the first item.
svn_utf_utf8_to_native): Consolidate so there's just one definition
for each function, with the preprocessor conditionals inside the
function bodies.  This avoids tags table lossage.

author: blair
msg: Some source document that we're copying and pasting the Collab.Net
copyright from has the word `acknowledgment' misspelled.

author: sussman
msg: * repos_admin.texi:  finish writing this chapter, phew!
* svn-handbook.texi:  include the new appendices.texi file.
* license.texi:  deleted, now its own appendix.
* appendices.texi:  empty outline of this file.

author: rooneg
msg: Fix a few little nits I ran into while reading the handbook.
(Features): for the sake of the non-unix users who will read this, refer
to the 'svn mv' and 'svn cp' commands as 'svn move' and 'svn copy'.
